website_summaries.verdict: Buyers wanting an inexpensive, miniature-sized pool ball set will enjoy this model for their billiard collection.
pros: Option to purchase with black triangle rack
Includes a ball tray to securely hold the set during storage
Miniature set sized at 1.5 inches for each ball
cons: Many owners expected the set to be larger

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was the correct size for my pool table I got my son, and it is. This will fit pool table for kids that have multiple games, the table has pool, fooseball, hockey and ping pong. The table is roughly foot in length. When I kept searching, all I can find was regular balls and triangles or desktop table with very small balls. Also I was not expecting the items for another 5 days! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M

customer_reviews.title: Great Color, Action
customer_reviews.text: These little pool balls are GREAT! What a value! They play true and have great action. They look great too. The set comes well packaged with foam and includes a triangle rack. My son and I have enjoyed using them on a miniature pool table he made with a friend. They're excellent and come at an excellent price. Completely surpassed expectations.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kingsriter

customer_reviews.title: More fun than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for a decorative project I had in mind. I decided to play a real game with them before my project and it was too much fun. I have to get another set so I can still do my project.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set.
customer_reviews.text: Just needed the cue ball. Got a whole set. No triangle, didn't need one. Perfect set.
customer_reviews.author: Ashaweeeeeeee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get the pool balls but no triangle to hold them in
customer_reviews.author: vintagepartsguy63

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad loved these. They are perfect for a small / childs table.
customer_reviews.author: VooDooChili00

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little set - worked great for me
customer_reviews.author: Mike/Dave

customer_reviews.title: Balls is in good shape
customer_reviews.text: Balls are great, the triangle came in broken piece pieces, luckily I only need the cue ball
customer_reviews.author: Tom le

customer_reviews.title: Mini balls
customer_reviews.text: these were prefect for are table we got from a garage sale
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy these to play bollards with but to make custom machine tool handle ends. As I was drilling and tapping them I found there construction was very well done and very consistent through out.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great low price for replacement 1.5" billiard balls
customer_reviews.text: Bought a mini pool table last year. Since then 2 striped balls had cleanly broken where the white meets the color stripe. Bought this set for a low price and my kids are happy again.
customer_reviews.author: lise-helene

customer_reviews.title: I used them in a 15 inch wall clock that turned out beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The balls were as stated. I used them in a 15 inch wall clock that turned out beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality of this set. The balls are heavy and feel comparable to a full size pool ball. Feels like they will last a long time. Would recommend and/or buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: Just nice and cheap, I bought it because I needed 3 balls for something else, I did not use it for actually playing pool
customer_reviews.author: pablo varela

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy, I can now play pool
customer_reviews.text: My mini pool table, had 2 balls missing so bought a new rack.
customer_reviews.author: maria lindo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set. I use them as a decoration Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mona Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same as the regular size just mini
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 5yr old. They look and feel just like the normal sized billard balls. Same, just mini. They're adorable. Come in a nice box. If you need mini's I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and I have been playing pool on an old Fisher Price pool table that was his Mom's when she was a kid and a couple of balls were missing. These are perfect and the price was right!
customer_reviews.author: JChevalier

customer_reviews.title: More then advertised. It said it didn't come with ...
customer_reviews.text: More then advertised. It said it didn't come with a rack but I was pleasantly surprised when the set had a rack with it. Thanks for the freebie.
customer_reviews.author: chris n

customer_reviews.title: THEY ARE VERY SMALL.... AND SMALL ...
customer_reviews.text: THEY ARE VERY SMALL.... AND SMALL RETURN WINDOW, I NEEDED TO RETURN THEM SINCE THE PARTY NEVER OCCURRED HOWEVER THE RETURN WINDOW IS CLOSED.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition to my vintage mini billiards Minnesota fats pool table .

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement part
customer_reviews.text: Right size for our old game table. Will let the next generation of kids enjoy mini pool

customer_reviews.title: The billiard balls were fine, however
customer_reviews.text: The billiard balls were fine, however, they came without the setup triangle. I thought that since they were pictured as a set, everything would be included.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balls only go in the corner pockets, but that's ok I only play 9-ball.

customer_reviews.title: The size was too large for pool table, and ...
customer_reviews.text: The size was too large for pool table,and didn't realize until I carried them to my nephew 2 weeks later,then it was to late to returned they said!

customer_reviews.title: I didn't get the rack for the balls. Not ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the rack for the balls. Not sure what happened there. Thought the balls came with the rack.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nicely priced and my nephew loves playing this game

customer_reviews.title: Size smaller than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The size was a little smaller than I thought, but they serve their purpose. The shipping time was quick!

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is top notch!! Very impressive. I highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the triangle holder with this BUT did NOT

customer_reviews.text: I was really getting it for the triangle. After it arrived and that wasn't there, I went back and read the description further to find out it wasn't included. I wish the picture would have been more accurate, but I should have read closer. :(

customer_reviews.title: Good balls. No Triangle.
customer_reviews.text: The balls are great but it doesn’t come with a triangle. Be warned.

customer_reviews.title: good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Its the smaller version of the big ones...good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them

customer_reviews.text: Balls great.... But should take the rack out of the picture...... Or sell that too...... That would be better.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Awesome love doing this with my granddaughter she is only 7 and kicks my but at pool LOL!!!!!!!! We have lots of fun

customer_reviews.title: Everything arrived in good shape. No problems with any of the billiard ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived in good shape. No problems with any of the billiard balls. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO COOL!! I was super impressed with the packaging ...
customer_reviews.text: SO COOL!! I was super impressed with the packaging and how fast i got these. They are adorable! love them :)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good. I thought it would be smaller, but it still served my purpose

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement when one ball from our original set disappears
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Perfect replacement when one ball from our original set disappears! :-)

customer_reviews.title: I was able to use them to decorate a cake ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to use them to decorate a cake designed as a pooltable. I was really content with the compliments I received from friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what all the bad reviews are about
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what all the bad reviews are about, I received mine in less time than I thought, nice set will work perfect for what I am using them for and arrived in a rack just as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: mini pool balls
customer_reviews.text: Pool balls and rack Where in the package I'm very happy with the pool balls very high in quality.
customer_reviews.author: stacy stembridge

customer_reviews.title: Get the correct size rack!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5' mini pool/ air hockey table! Peradon sells multiple size racks, including one for these 15x 1 1/2" balls. Do not get the rack often paired with this ball set that says it is for 1 3/8" balls!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy7

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described my son loves them thanks again !!! Would order again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Mini Billiards Pool Ball Set
customer_reviews.text: The down side is, they are bigger than I wanted. We are using them, we just have to decrease the number on our little table.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The balls arrived and are perfect for my table. Actually better than the balls that came with the pool table.

customer_reviews.title: Rack
customer_reviews.text: No set, just the Rack and it was too small. Can't use it. It's too small to use with all the balls, but the kids still try to use it.

customer_reviews.title: neat
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice and solid set. I hope they update the photo and exclude the triangle.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISMENT! (no rack)
customer_reviews.text: False advertisment! DOES NOT INCLUDE RACK, disappointed because the product garenteed a rack which I never received. The actual balls are nice but I did not reicieve what I paid for. I gave this as a gift, so it was extremely disappointing to give an uncomplete gift.
customer_reviews.author: kkkkk

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: I was very dissappointed whn I recv this item...if I cld gv this seller a NO STAR tht wld b 2much..I order this items 4 my kids as a christmas gift I didnt recv it until after Christmas, wen I open the pack there was rack 4 da ball.. it was just the little balls ..I contacted the seller he told me I assume wrong nothing comes with it.. he ddnt apologize 4 the delay..I was extremely upset with amazon, Ups and the seller 4 this mishap...as far the balls thy were great size 4 the kids but for $20 the rack should have come with it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product - excellent value. Item was as described and am very happy with it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product - excellent value. Item was as described and am very happy with it. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Does not include rack. Yup, should have read ...
customer_reviews.text: Does not include rack. Yup, should have read the reviews.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Used these to create a wall decoration. Perfect, and just like the “real” normal sized balls. Solid! Good buy and price.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed they are too big for the miniature pool table ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed they are too big for the miniature pool table my son has, tried to return but it costs almost as much to return them so why waste my time or money
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows the rack. The rack wasn't included. I wouldn't have ordered the balls at that price with no rack. Now I can't find the correct size rack. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: John Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: It came in the mail very fast. The balls are very nice. Rack is a little flimsy. I would order from this company again. They were for my son's and are perfect for them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Conchas

customer_reviews.title: balls no rack...seriously?
customer_reviews.text: The set does not come as pictured. There's no rack, just the balls. Kind of misleading.
customer_reviews.author: mbray59612

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: My question was answered immediately. Extremely customer service orientated company. Will definitely buy from again. Thank you Susan Fresno, Ca
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Mini pool balls great item , alto when looking for this item I needed the rack and at the time it said and showed the rack was included, but after purchased it said no rack included, quite disappointed as was looking for only with the included rack, oh, well.
customer_reviews.author: carole anderson

customer_reviews.title: I get that the pic showing the rack may be the best available but description should really elaborate on content
customer_reviews.text: The set came boxed, and as with other reviews, did not contain a rack. But our grandsons with thrilled anyway to have real pool balls for their garage sale table. I get that the pic showing the rack may be the best available but description should really elaborate on content. Our kids didn't care a bit but others might be very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy G

customer_reviews.title: Pleasure fo a Special Boy
customer_reviews.text: These have been used by an autistic young man who delights in playing pool with them. A good product for such a special boy.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The balls are of great quality, but I was disappointed it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: The balls are of great quality , but I was disappointed it did not come with the ball rack as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: jorge morales

customer_reviews.title: Mini-Pool Balls
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little set of pool balls for my grand kids as a Christmas present. They're just like the normal sized pool balls, and come in an attractive packaging idea. The kids couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Pedersen

customer_reviews.title: got beat
customer_reviews.text: Never got an answer on the product I purchase because it was the wrong size pool balls and no one will response. I will never order from y'all again and will not recommend either.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny56

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set for my son. The rack wasnt included like it says. I am having a hard time trying to find the rack. I am so disappointed. I will contact amazon to try to get the rack.
customer_reviews.author: natjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Way to small...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have a miniature pool table which is about 6 foot long. These balls are for the even smaller 4 foot tables. I returned these after they arrived. I still can't find the size balls I need which is a size between these and normal size balls.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Mini billiard balls and rack
customer_reviews.text: The billiard balls and rack arrived as pictured, including the black, plastic rack. This is what I expected and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CA cook

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete order received no way to get it correct : (
customer_reviews.text: I received my order but the rack was not included. The advertisement specifically said pool ball set including rack. I am disappointed and discouraged because my order was not complete and it is impossible to speak with someone about the incorrect order. I will mostlikely not purchase anything else through Amazon unless I am contacted so that I can receive the rack.
customer_reviews.author: bg2love

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Expensive shipping:-o
customer_reviews.text: I think the item was fine, but I paid more than the item itself...... 12.50 for a ten dollar item..... u.s.p.s
customer_reviews.author: Lee D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: adorable and cute little balls, perfect for our tiny salesman pool table display

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, arrived without damaging, delivered on time..would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DAD 5IVE Mini Billiards Pool Ball Set
product_meta.description: 1 1/2in Miniature Pool Balls. All balls 1-15 and cue ball, rack is NOT included
